text:
Quinton Hughes (born October 14, 1999) is an American ice hockey defenseman. He is currently playing for the Vancouver Canucks of the National Hockey League (NHL). The team drafted him 7th overall during the 2018 NHL Entry Draft.
After playing with the USA Hockey National Team Development Program, Hughes joined the University of Michigan for the 2017–18 season. He played two seasons with Michigan before joining the Canucks for their 2018–19 NHL season.

annotations.surface_form: USA Hockey National Team Development Program
